actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 62(c) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to increase the authorization of appropriations for dam work on the Big Sandy River.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to increase the authorization of appropriations for dam repair on the Big Sandy River, Kentucky and West Virginia. Authorizes the appropriation of additional funds for such repair during fiscal year l978.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 62(c) of the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to increase the authorization of appropriations for dam work on the Big Sandy River.
